description:
**AST SpaceMobile** - Building space-based cellular broadband network for direct-to-device connectivity.

**The Bull Case:**
• Massive TAM: Global mobile connectivity via satellites
• Strategic partnerships: AT&T, Vodafone, Rakuten (~2.8B subscribers)
• Technology validated with BlueBird test satellite
• Binary catalyst: FCC approval unlocks commercial operations
• First-mover advantage in direct-to-standard-phone satellite connectivity

**The Bear Case:**
• Pre-revenue, cash-burning business model
• FCC approval carries binary risk (could delay or deny)
• SpaceX/Starlink competition (much better capitalized)
• Massive execution risk on building global satellite constellation
• No moat clarity until network effects emerge
• Requires significant additional capital

**The Key Question:**
Is the probability of FCC approval underpriced by the market at $4.20? This is a classic binary catalyst setup with asymmetric payoff potential but significant downside risk if catalyst fails.

**For Value Investors:** Hard pass - no earnings, no moat evidence
**For Contrarians:** Interesting IF FCC approval probability is >70%
**For Growth Investors:** Core thesis - disruptive technology with massive TAM
**For Catalyst Investors:** Perfect setup with clear binary event
